data.name: Wobbl - The Lost Wands
data.detailed_description:
What if you could edit a platformer level while playing it? Wobbl is a mix of precision and puzzle platformers, in which you make use of different types of edit wands to complete the level.

Edit Wands



Wobbl is filled with familiar edit wands like the Delete wand, Duplicate wand, Move wand, and more. Use these wands to your advantage to complete levels.

Levels



Complete a colourful selection of beautiful pixel art levels, each one filled with unique mechanics, fun puzzles and challenging platforming sections.

The Level Is Your Playground



No problem has only one solution. Use the wands given to you creatively to carve your path through the level or just mess around with objects and enemies - No matter how you use them, these tools will redefine your expectations.

Free Demo


A free demo is now available! Play through the first zone of the game right now!! do it!!!

data.short_description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or more idk
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Support required
  • Storage: 99999999999 GB available space
  • Sound Card: you probably need one
  • Additional Notes: do not eat your computer while playing please
